# <a name="how-to-remove-autogenerated-columns-from-a-windows-forms-datagridview-control"></a><span data-ttu-id="c891a-102">Postupy: Odebrání automaticky vygenerovaných sloupců z ovládacího prvku Windows Forms DataGridView</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c891a-102">How to: Remove Autogenerated Columns from a Windows Forms DataGridView Control</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c891a-103">Pokud vaše <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> ovládacího prvku nastavená na automatické generování sloupců na základě dat z jeho zdroje dat, je možné selektivně vynechat některé sloupce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c891a-103">When your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to autogenerate its columns based on data from its data source, you can selectively omit certain columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c891a-104">Toto lze provést zavoláním <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> metodu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> kolekce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c891a-104">You can do this by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c891a-105">Alternativně můžete skrýt sloupce ze zobrazení tak, že nastavíte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> vlastnost `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c891a-105">Alternatively, you can hide columns from view by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c891a-106">Tato technika je užitečná, pokud chcete zobrazit skryté sloupce za určitých podmínek nebo pokud potřebujete získat přístup k datům ve sloupci bez zobrazení.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c891a-106">This technique is useful when you want to display the hidden columns in certain conditions, or when you need to access the data in the columns without displaying it.</span></span>  
  
### <a name="to-remove-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="c891a-107">K odebrání automaticky vygenerovaných sloupců</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c891a-107">To remove autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c891a-108">Volání <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> metodu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> kolekce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c891a-108">Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#111)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#111)]  
  
### <a name="to-hide-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="c891a-109">Chcete-li skrýt automaticky vygenerovaných sloupců</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c891a-109">To hide autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c891a-110">Nastavit sloupci <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> vlastnost `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c891a-110">Set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#112)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#112)]

## <a name="compiling-the-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="c891a-112">Probíhá kompilace kódu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c891a-112">Compiling the Code</span></span>  
 <span data-ttu-id="c891a-113">Tento příklad vyžaduje:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c891a-113">This example requires:</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c891a-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> ovládací prvek s názvem `dataGridView1` vázána na tabulku, která obsahuje `Fax` a `CustomerID` sloupců, jako `Customers` tabulky v ukázkové databázi Northwind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c891a-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control named `dataGridView1` bound to a table that contains `Fax` and `CustomerID` columns, such as the `Customers` table in the Northwind sample database.</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c891a-115">Odkazy <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> a <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> sestavení.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c891a-115">References to the <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> assemblies.</span></span>
